title: Rep. Jim Banks, Trade, DNC’s Tom Perez
itunes:title: Rep. Jim Banks, Trade, DNC’s Tom Perez
description:
Guests include: Congressman Jim Banks, a Republican from Indiana, and John Solomon, Journalist and Executive Vice President at the Hill.

Other guests:Tom Perez, Chairman of the Democratic National Committee discussed the U.S. economy.

Trump 2020 Senior Advisor Lara Trump discussed the launch of the ‘Women for Trump’ coalition.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
